Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes the small business pandemic job retention tax credit program
Summary: Establishes the small business pandemic job retention tax credit program.
LawCode: Add Art 23 §§450 - 459, Ec Dev L; add §45, amd §§210-B & 606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the small business pandemic job retention tax credit
